Articles.Content: When the part information panes were updated crossfeed capability was removed. Please restore this information.
Yeah, that's pretty important information. It should definitely be shown.

Actually, I'm fairly sure it's still shown. Right-click on a part once or twice to show the extended information panel.

EDIT: Sorry, nope. It's shown all the same, though it's only displayed if a part does not crossfeed -- all parts that don't show No Fuel Crossfeed should be crossfeed enabled.

Edited April 11, 2014 by vexx32
Ah, thanks. This means that the lack of fuel crossfeed on the XL girders is a bug.

Not necessarily. There are certain configurations whereing fuel won't flow; this is intended more often than not, though it isn't always completely and utterly intuitive. If you post a thread in Support or Gameplay Questions with some pictures of the setup you're trying to work with, I'm sure we'll be able to figure out what's going on. Kasuha has an excellent thread on fuel flow logic and its little intricacies (which I really ought to bookmark as I can never find it when I need it) which might be good to look through.

Anyway, since this is already in the game, no need for a Suggestions topic, so I'll close it.
